title: Noam Chomsky | An Online Event with King's Politics
description:
This was a live streamed discussion conducted on December 2nd with Professor Noam Chomsky, one of the most well-known and respected linguists and political activists in the world.

Noam Chomsky is the author of over 100 books, including “Hegemony or Survival: America’s Quest for Global Dominance”, “Manufacturing Consent: The Political Economy of the Mass Media”, “Who Rules the World?”, “Profit Over People: Neoliberalism and the Global Order”, and “Internationalism or Extinction”. 

Noam’s latest book is “Climate Crisis and the Global Green New Deal: The Political Economy of Saving the Planet”, which was published by Verso this year.
